TopoSpam
  • Home

  • Examples

Topologically Informed Simulation Platform for Morphogenesis and Biological Active Matter

    TopoSPAM is a versatile, topologically-informed simulation software designed to study biological active matter and morphogenesis, with advanced features including active nematic gels, topological-defect-driven shape dynamics, and 3D vertex tissue models. This user-friendly platform excels at capturing emergent flows and shapes across scales, potentially revolutionizing personalized study of active matter.
